name: Encryption or wiping in progress – Containment
description:
# 🔒 Encryption or Wiping in Progress – Containment

---

## 🎯 Usage

Immediately deploy containment measures to:

* Isolate compromised systems
* Slow down the spread of encryption or wiping
* Protect backups and critical servers
* Preserve evidence

---

## ⚙️ Prerequisites before starting

* ✅ Incident confirmed: identified as encryption/wiping (e.g. ransomware), with scope, impact, and urgency assessed
  → Recommended sheet: *Encryption or Wiping in Progress – Qualification*
* 🔑 Administration capabilities available (network, system, security) or ability to quickly mobilize the service provider

---

## 📌 **Objectives**

✅ **Contain the spread**
      1. Temporarily isolate from the Internet
      2. Isolate infected machines
      3. Hinder the spread of encryption

✅ **Preserve essential assets**
      4. Protect backups
      5. Protect backup storage media
      6. Backup **one single** domain controller (Windows)

✅ **Preserve traces**
      7. Retain logs and evidence

---

## 📄 Resource

👉 [Full reflex sheet – CERT-FR](https://www.intercert-france.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/fichereflexe-chiffrement-endiguement.pdf)

tasks.title: Measure 4 – Protect backups
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective

Enable a complete and reliable restoration during **business recovery**.

### 📌 Actions

* Identify the different types of backups in the information system
* Identify backup management servers
* Protect backup consoles/storage (disconnection, snapshots, immutability)
* Protect file servers not covered by backups

### ✅ Deliverables

* Backups secured
* Inventory of preserved servers and backups documented in the **activities** of this task

tasks.title: Measure 6 – Preserve domain controller (Windows)
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective

Preserve a minimal **Active Directory** for recovery.

### 📌 Actions

* Preserve **one** healthy DC; lock access; back up its state
* Preferably select a physical domain controller and power it off
* Preserve a virtual domain controller by exporting it from the hypervisor to an offline disk

### ✅ Deliverables

* Domain controller preserved
* Record of actions documented in the **activities** of this task

tasks.title: Measure 3 – Hinder the spread of encryption
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective

Reduce the spread if encryption appears to continue despite previous measures.

### 📌 Actions

* Neutralize suspected compromised privileged accounts (Reset, Disable)
  → If the specific privileged account used for encryption is unknown, consider neutralizing all privileged accounts
* Scan the Active Directory domain SYSVOL folder with an up-to-date antivirus from a clean machine
* Inspect common propagation methods (GPO, scheduled tasks, executables)

### ✅ Deliverables

* Spread slowed
* Actions taken documented in the **activities** of this task

tasks.title: Measure 1 – Temporarily isolate from the Internet
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective

Contain the spread of the attack.

### 📌 Actions

* Cut **inbound** (including VPN) and **outbound** traffic on perimeter firewalls
  → test the isolation
* Reopen **gradually** the essential traffic using a **whitelist** (SOC, EDR, critical services)

### ✅ Deliverables

* Effective isolation
* List of blocked traffic documented in the **activities** of this task

tasks.title: Measure 7 – Preserve traces
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective

For investigation purposes, preserve the oldest possible logs, increase their retention, and raise their verbosity.

### 📌 Actions

* Preserve traces in equipment logs
* Preserve traces in authentication logs
* Decide on preservation of the log sink
* Collect files related to encryption

### ✅ Deliverables

* Most verbose traces possible
* Inventory of logs and files documented in the **activities** of this task

tasks.title: Measure 5 – Protect backup storage media
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective

Identify and ensure the protection/integrity of backup media.

### 📌 Actions

* Identify and isolate backup media (disk, NAS, cloud)
* Suspend any unnecessary handling
* Physically secure removable media
* Enable locking or encryption mechanisms if available (disconnection, snapshots, immutability)

### ✅ Deliverables

* Backup integrity report
* Record of actions documented in the **activities** of this task

tasks.title: Closure & transition to remediation
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective

Confirm **stabilization** and plan reconstruction.

### 📌 Actions

* Timeline, IoCs, decisions
* Prioritized backlog for reconstruction/hardening

### ✅ Deliverables

End-of-containment report + plan

tasks.title: Measure 2 – Isolate infected machines
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective

Prevent propagation from this machine to the rest of the information system

### 📌 Actions

* Pause VM / hibernate / isolate via EDR network control or physically
* Keep infected machines separated from the rest of the information system
* Isolate infected zones from the rest of the information system

### ✅ Deliverables

* Machines isolated
* List of isolated machines documented in the **activities** of this task
